page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT - WOMEN
page.content:
The pattern of women's employment in the area is very different from the men's. The children's survey shows:- Mothers' Work Pattern Full time employment (paid) 58% Part time employment (unpaid) 15% At home (housewife unpaid!) 27%
Mothers' Places of Work Loddiswell 47% Locally outside village 21% Kingsbridge 21% Travelling widely 11% (Housewives not counted in this)
So it seems that a high percentage of women find work locally, and only a few commute. Local shops, the school, and services provide most employment. Until recently the local Egg Packing and Poultry Station gave plenty of work for women, but it is now closed.
